ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) fillet cod, cut into 2 pieces
1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed and cut into 2 rectangles
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ (4 ounce) jar roasted red bell peppers, drained and sliced

cookingTips: Wrap fish tightly in pastry with minimal filling to ensure fish cooks through before pastry darkens too much
Brush pastry with beaten egg for even golden-brown color and glossy finish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: En croute cooking traps steam to poach the fish while pastry provides contrast. How will you time the pastry and fish cooking?
